question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Kāpēc Kota Bogora, Indonēzija, ir pazīstama kā "lietus pilsēta"?
answer: Kota Bogora, Indonēzija, ir pazīstama kā "lietus pilsēta" tāpēc, ka tai raksturīgs ļoti augsts nokrišņu daudzums visa gada garumā.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor, Indonesia, is known as the "rain city" because of its very high rainfall throughout the year.
